description: As a software trainer at Gtec Computer Education , I was responsible for delivering comprehensive training in various programming languages and technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, Django, C, C++, Java, and PHP. I designed and implemented instructional plans, tailored to different skill levels, to ensure students gained a solid understanding of both foundational concepts and practical applications. My role involved guiding students through hands-on exercises, troubleshooting code, and fostering a deep understanding of programming best practices, preparing them with the necessary skills.
